text: Honduran lempira is the national currency of Honduras and is equal to 26.02 dollars as of May 21,2025.It is referred to by the symbol HNL and L. Lempira is named after a 16th century ruler known as Lempira who is a national hero and is honored in the 1 Lempira note and 20 and 50 centavos coins.For banknotes there are 1,2,5,10,20,50,100,200,500 Lempiras. Coins There are 1,2,5,10,20,and 50 centavo coins. 50 centavos are equal to 0.04 USD.
title: Honduran lempira
